simple_push.name: s1
simple_push.description:
Push a data assuming:
ID, TIMESTAMP, BALANCE_BEFORE, BALANCE_AFTER, TYPE='buy', MODE='liquid', REGISTER='snack', BUDGET_LIMIT, PRIORITY='wants', IS_INTERNAL='no', ORIGIN='self', END='Market'
REQUIRE: DESCRIPTION, AMOUNT, NOTE
simple_push.description2: Useful for Simple and Daily spending on snacks.
